item.title: 已宣布不再寻求连任的共和党众议员肯-巴克（Ken Buck）周二宣布，他将于下周末离开国会。
item.description:
Republican Rep. Ken Buck, who had already announced he would not be seeking reelection, announced Tuesday he will leave Congress at the end of next week. https://t.co/f5umzNIsoL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 新消息：俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）表示，如果俄罗斯的国家地位、主权或独立受到威胁，俄罗斯随时准备使用核武器，但他希望美国不要采取可能引发核冲突的行动。
item.description:
NEW: Russian Pres. Vladimir Putin said that Russia is ready to use nuclear weapons if there is a threat to Russian statehood, sovereignty or independence, but said he hoped that the U.S. would refrain from actions that could trigger a nuclear conflict. https://t.co/hLe9mmStFb

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，刑事转介可能成为陷入困境的拜登弹劾调查的 "退出策略"。
item.description:
Criminal referrals emerge as possible "exit strategy" of struggling Biden impeachment inquiry, sources say. https://t.co/S2TFB7194i

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 前总统特朗普的律师在一份法庭文件中表示，他将不会在本月晚些时候的封口费审判中援引正式的 "律师建议 "辩护。
item.description:
Former Pres. Trump will not invoke a formal "advice of counsel" defense in his hush money trial later this month, his lawyers signaled in a court filing.https://t.co/r9oGzzUwPk

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 据当地媒体报道，中国河北省北部一家餐馆发生强烈爆炸，造成至少 1 人死亡，22 人受伤。
item.description:
At least one person was killed and 22 injured after a strong explosion destroyed a restaurant in China's northern Hebei province, local media reported. pic.twitter.com/2ewO9Hnek6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 周二，至少有七个俄罗斯领土遭到数十架无人机的袭击，这是乌克兰在俄罗斯境内发动明显袭击的第二天：
item.description:
At least seven Russian territories were targeted by dozens of uncrewed drones on Tuesday, marking a second day of apparent Ukrainian strikes within Russia.

Read more: https://t.co/8VcdeMc7aY pic.twitter.com/INkWZirHWI

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：数十架无人机袭击了至少七个俄罗斯领土，这是乌克兰在俄罗斯境内发动明显袭击的第二天。
item.description:
LATEST: At least seven Russian territories targeted by dozens of drones, marking a second day of apparent Ukrainian strikes within Russia. https://t.co/eylhxm1Kw4

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 根据美国南方司令部的一份声明，一队美国海军陆战队员已被派往美国驻海地太子港大使馆提供额外的安全保护：
item.description:
A team of U.S. Marines has been sent to provide additional security at the U.S. embassy in Port au Prince, Haiti, according to a statement from U.S. Southern Command.

Read more: https://t.co/HJOoYzYlAa pic.twitter.com/LS4a8FxvyD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 三名妇女和一只狗被发现死在拉斯维加斯的两处公寓中，警方称他们开枪打死了一名持枪对峙的潜在嫌疑人：
item.description:
Three women and a dog were found dead in two separate apartments in Las Vegas as police say they shot and killed a potential suspect in the case who confronted them with a firearm, authorities say.

Read more: https://t.co/6UG36sbbxt pic.twitter.com/mAwi4vvZD4

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：根据美国南方司令部的一份声明，一队美国海军陆战队员已被派往海地太子港的美国大使馆提供额外的安全保护。
item.description:
JUST IN: A team of U.S. Marines has been sent to provide additional security at the U.S. embassy in Port au Prince, Haiti, according to a statement from U.S. Southern Command. https://t.co/uRhzJagEVj

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 研究人员发现了一种新方法，可以促进退化珊瑚礁种群的恢复。
item.description:
Researchers have discovered a new method that could encourage the restoration of degraded coral reef populations, which have been declining around the world due to record-high marine temperatures.https://t.co/g6oHJCZL3Z pic.twitter.com/9CYehU9lba

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 三名妇女和一条狗被发现死在拉斯维加斯的两处公寓中，警方称他们开枪打死了一名持枪对峙的潜在嫌疑人。
item.description:
Three women and a dog were found dead in two separate apartments in Las Vegas as police say they shot and killed a potential suspect in the case who confronted them with a firearm, authorities say. https://t.co/WjYaW6ryNY

item.title: 一群大学生联合起来筹集资金，并为一名宿舍保安提供了一次回尼日利亚老家探亲的惊喜之旅。
item.description:
A group of college students banded together to raise money and surprise a residence hall security guard with a trip to visit family back home in Nigeria. https://t.co/5isl64W3w5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 特朗普竞选团队加倍重申了特朗普之前的言论，即其他国家应为俄乌战争付出更多代价。
item.description:
The Trump campaign is doubling down on Trump's previous comments that other countries should pay more of the cost of the Russia-Ukraine war.https://t.co/pXWqAsAzZN

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 根据验尸官的报告，曾多次对公司生产标准提出质疑的波音公司前雇员周六死于 "自残式 "枪伤。
item.description:
The former Boeing employee who raised numerous concerns about the company's production standards died from a "self-inflicted" gunshot wound Saturday, according to a coroner's report.

Authorities said the investigation is still active.https://t.co/GIjKvNtpPy pic.twitter.com/jDqIU2Y3qb

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 已故演员鲍勃-萨盖特（Bob Saget）的妻子凯莉-里佐（Kelly Rizzo）在《豪门盛宴》主演去世两年多后，坦言自己克服了悲痛，重新开始约会。
item.description:
Kelly Rizzo, the wife of late actor Bob Saget, is opening up about overcoming grief to be able to date again more than two years after "Full House" star's death. https://t.co/i43nwoM34E

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 三年前，俄勒冈州将少量非法药物（从芬太尼、冰毒到快克）非刑罪化。但一些州领导、居民和其他人对这项在 2020 年选民批准的倡议后通过的法律有了新的想法。
item.description:
Three years ago, Oregon decriminalized small amounts of illicit drugs, from fentanyl to meth to crack.

But some state leaders, residents and others are having second thoughts about the law, which was passed following a 2020 voter-approved initiative. https://t.co/73Nj5cGncv pic.twitter.com/2u2FGmVhqI

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 警方称，在墨西哥一条高速公路边的墓地里发现了一具自今年 2 月起失踪的 54 岁妇女的尸体。
item.description:
The body of a 54-year-old woman missing since February has been found in a cemetery on the side of a highway in Mexico, police say. https://t.co/fFTDRYiXuT

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在《纽约时报》首次获得的 3 月 8 日事件的视频中，可以看到警察反复击打一名被拘留的移民并对他使用电击枪，当时他正抱着自己 1 岁大的孩子。
item.description:
In video of the March 8 incident first obtained by The New York Times, officers can be seen repeatedly striking and using a stun gun on a detained migrant while he’s holding his 1-year-old child.https://t.co/eBX5HIvMgj pic.twitter.com/lamW4R6EX0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国广播公司新闻（ABC News）根据美国广播公司新闻的代表估算结果预测，经过周二的新一轮投票，总统拜登和前总统特朗普已分别获得民主党和共和党的总统候选人提名。
item.description:
Pres. Biden and former Pres. Trump have clinched the Democratic and Republican presidential nominations, respectively, after another round of voting on Tuesday, ABC News projects based on the ABC News delegate estimate. https://t.co/VU8fp4MtQc

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：美国广播公司（ABC News）根据选票分析预测，乔-拜登将赢得华盛顿州民主党初选。
item.description:
BREAKING: Joe Biden will win the Democratic primary in Washington, ABC News projects, based on analysis of the vote. https://t.co/7HnGqGz5Zn pic.twitter.com/CEtVhhbFV0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据 ABC 新闻报道，唐纳德-特朗普已获得足够的代表票数，将获得共和党总统候选人提名。
item.description:
BREAKING: Donald Trump has earned enough delegates to clinch the Republican nomination for president, ABC News projects. https://t.co/1VcnnOQTYP pic.twitter.com/Uytg8mOLyy

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：美国广播公司新闻（ABC News）根据投票分析预测，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将赢得华盛顿共和党初选。
item.description:
BREAKING: Donald Trump will win the Republican primary in Washington, ABC News projects, based on analysis of the vote. https://t.co/4DBp6GD3wL pic.twitter.com/W7NgWRv84t

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 妮芙-坎贝尔（Neve Campbell）将重返《惊声尖叫》系列电影。这位 50 岁的女演员周三在 Instagram 上确认，她将出演《惊声尖叫 7》。
item.description:
Neve Campbell is returning to the "Scream" franchise.

The actress, 50, took to Instagram on Wednesday to confirm she will star in "Scream 7."

The "Party of Five" actress quit the franchise ahead of 2023's "Scream VI" after a salary dispute.https://t.co/f8D9XmomrR pic.twitter.com/M98kN4Ijnf

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 一群大学生联合起来筹集资金，并为一名宿舍保安提供了一次回尼日利亚老家探亲的惊喜之旅。

A group of college students banded together to raise money and surprise a residence hall security guard with a trip to visit family back home in Nigeria. https://t.co/9r71A2xrLU

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 纽约市市长埃里克-亚当斯（Eric Adams）表示，纽约警察在与一名移民发生暴力冲突时采取了 "适当的行动"。在视频中，可以看到警察多次对一名抱着一岁孩子的男子进行殴打并使用电击枪。
item.description:
New York City Mayor Eric Adams says NYPD officers took "appropriate action" during a violent altercation with a migrant.

In the video, officers can be seen repeatedly striking and using a stun gun on a man while he’s holding his 1-year-old child.https://t.co/420iS8cjXC

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 意大利的研究人员发现了他们认为是世界上已知最古老的口红管：一个小而华丽的石瓶，里面装着深红色的膏状物，其历史可以追溯到公元前 1936 年到公元前 1687 年之间：
item.description:
Researchers in Italy have identified what they believe is the world's oldest known lipstick tube: a small, ornate stone vial containing a deep red paste that dates back to some time between 1936 B.C. and 1687 B.C.

Learn more: https://t.co/hpWAlXsXr5 pic.twitter.com/3YKYAquLwu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 根据验尸官的报告，曾多次对公司生产标准提出质疑的波音公司前雇员周六死于 "自残式 "枪伤。
item.description:
The former Boeing employee who raised numerous concerns about the company's production standards died from a "self-inflicted" gunshot wound Saturday, according to a coroner's report.

Authorities said the investigation is still active.https://t.co/sgyelpbuni pic.twitter.com/CiTMMZSOgp

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 这只刚出生的狐狸是一名遛狗的男子在里士满的一条小巷里发现的。管理员希望能够将这只狐狸放归大自然。
item.description:
Caretakers at a Virginia wildlife center are doing their best to comfort an orphaned fox pup — even wearing a red fox mask at feeding time.

The newborn fox was found in a Richmond alley by a man walking his dog. Caretakers hope to be able to release the fox back into the wild. pic.twitter.com/5dBfVaRUWA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 已故演员鲍勃-萨盖特（Bob Saget）的妻子凯莉-里佐（Kelly Rizzo）在《豪门盛宴》主演去世两年多后，坦言自己克服了悲痛，重新开始约会。
item.description:
